name: Wheelie King 4 Online wheelie
description:
One of the best wheelie games on the market!
Fourth part of Wheelie King family!

Experience the thrill of formula drift in our latest motorsport racing game! Wheelie King 4 Moped Madness 3D will test your skill to the limit. How far can you perform wheelie and stunts with your motorcycle? Can you impress everyone as you rampage through the city, desert, or on off road tracks? Play our motorsport game and find out!
HOW TO PLAY: Tilt your phone to steer your motorcycle to left or right. Meanwhile, you can perform drift, wheelie, and stunts with the buttons. For example, you can use your thumb to tap clutch and press throttle button to activate drifting mode.
========================================================
FEATURES OF Wheelie King 4 – NITRO BIKE DRIFT GAME:
========================================================
Realistic and immersive game graphic & sound.
Unlock various challenges and tracks.
Use spray cans to paint all parts
Get coins to unlock more bikes and parts
Try your hand at riding low cc scooters and turbo bikes
Upgrade your motorcycles and customize them
Perform awesome motorcycle stunts on your bikes.
Set your graphic to Low or HD depending on your phone type.
Intuitive and response game control.
See how you perform compared to other players on Online Leaderboards.
TYPES OF CHALLENGE:
Time Challenge
Chased by the police
Our Motorsport game is very addictive and realistic. If you want to experience extreme motorcycle racing game, this is the game that you should try. Riding a motorbike is definitely more challenging than even the most extreme car driving simulator. That’s because you have to control everything at once: your direction, the speed, and how you throttle. To succeed as drift racer, you must give your 110% attention, especially if you are chased by the police!
If you are a gamer who doesn’t back down from a challenge, then this game is perfect for you! The Online Leaderboard will show who’s the best player among the best from around the world. So, if you are ready to take on this challenge, download our formula drift racing game now!
